      it's possible

      no

      got to be some middle ground somewhere

      how to easily make a mess of an entire room

4.17.20  11:53 pm   Is wearing socks and slippers a hate crime?

      no, it is a crime of love

4.17.20  11:51 pm   what is gravity

      you

4.17.20  11:48 pm   Cheese spell backwards is capitalism

      i believe you

4.17.20  11:42 pm   are humans inherently good or evil 

      good

4.17.20  11:38 pm   Can you give a random one second audio clip of the next song? (To clarify, next song = the one associated with the video that you're currently working on)

      i am not currently working on a video associated with any song

4.17.20  11:32 pm   i have many original songs in my notebook but i don't know anything about instruments. what should i do?

      i see 3 general options. 1. get an instrument and start playing with it. 2. meet someone who can play instruments and would like to play your songs. or, 3. sing them with absolutely no other instruments. i just realized i do not know if you were including your voice as an instrument

4.17.20  11:28 pm   Thoughts on thoughts?

      it's like another world.... in your mind

4.17.20  11:10 pm   why do we all still want to live even though nothing we do will ever matter or be remembered in the grand scheme of things?

      what i'm wondering is why your first middle and last name all contain only the letter O

4.17.20  11:09 pm   Do you like turtles? 

      no but that doesn't mean they are not extremely good

4.17.20  10:46 pm   why do i love your music so much?

      there is surely a conspiracy afoot

4.17.20  10:31 pm   if you wanted to do a thing what would you do

      the thing

4.17.20  10:05 pm   what's your favorite philosophy?? 

      switching philosophies

4.17.20  9:27 pm   what is the meaning of change

      it's what makes our entire world possible

4.17.20  9:14 pm   do you ever film/record yourself working to subsequently review and improve your workflow?

     yes

     why/why not?

     actually most of the benefit occurs while working, because it makes me more self aware, and i can discuss the process as it happens

      thank you!

4.17.20  9:13 pm   do you like capital letters

      yes

4.17.20  9:05 pm   Is sphube the first thing you have made since whoa heuifgareiu?

      no, i have made thousands of things, but i don't want to reveal most of them yet

4.17.20  8:59 pm   why didn't you want to be a doctor?

     because as far back as i can remember i had already made very broad and early advances in music, and zero advances in any medical field

      should I feel guilty about not wanting to be a doctor?

      that depends if there are any reasons why you should be a doctor

4.17.20  8:56 pm   was it intentional that your last 3 "holy ___ you are..." were in alphabetical order?

campground
canary farm
central greenhouse

      no

4.17.20  8:45 pm   is your next video going to be a song

      that would be nice

4.17.20  8:33 pm   do you know social studies for grade 7

      no

4.17.20  8:23 pm   Can you teach me about numbers?

      sure

4.17.20  8:20 pm   what do you like most?

      the possibilities, of all the different things to like

4.17.20  8:06 pm   Doesnt the thought that 4th dimensional beings can draw in the third dimension freak you out?

     no

      Or that drawing in 3D would literally mean using a 4th dimensional pencil?

     to draw at all, you will need 'time', which is usually regarded as the 4th dimension

4.17.20  8:04 pm   If cars are liberated trains, are blimps just tamed clouds?

      no

4.17.20  7:46 pm   mr wurtz, your music videos are very inspiring.

     that's very kind of you

      how do you come up with your video ideas and jingles?

      sometimes i must use my ................"brain"

4.17.20  7:30 pm   is everything already decided and i just have to play along?

      no

4.17.20  7:20 pm   opinions on negative numbers

      perfect for undoing a positive number

4.17.20  6:54 pm   I am not literate in music theory, so I am interested if you can bring insight to this conundrum. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c0sCTj6hMsQ this is the soundtrack to the ending of a movie, where the protagonist kills herself. If you listen to the track, this may seem surprising; the music isn't what one might associate with such tragedy. People in the comment section are grappling as to whether or not this is 'sad' music, and trying to comprehend what a confusing feeling it is to listen. There is some consensus that this really just 'neutral' music, meant to convey the idea that death is neutral. This is how I myself understand it.
There is one individual however, who is dead insistent and a bit aggressive that this is JOYOUS music simply because music theory says so. Major key == happy. Case closed. The fact that one is reminded of something separate should not be considered...
This blunt use of music theory stresses me out a bit. Is that somewhat true? Or not?

     'major key == happy' is not quite true. you can easily make a dreadfully sad song in a major key. also, my opinion from listening to the music you linked, is that it is extremely joyous. not 'because it's in a major key', but because it simply sounds extremely joyous. from listening to it

     What are the boundaries of what's should be considered part of music.

     the way it sounds, and the feelings it evokes, from the sounds, when paired with whatever context it's in

      Can't remember, but I think you mentioned that your videos are quite an important part of the music but of course your okay with the song without video being distributed (mp3 file, streaming, etc).

     the songs must be able to survive without the video, but my non-song videos (videos which are not based on songs) need the video and audio together in order to work properly

4.17.20  6:48 pm   Hi, Bill Wurtz. Thank you. Thank you for making me laugh. Where do you get all your great ideas?

      the gutter

4.17.20  6:32 pm   How do you keep this strange persona up so well? Wait is it a persona or is this actually what you're like

      i must admit that would be a great strategy

4.17.20  6:29 pm   are steve and not steve two different people?

     no

      like, was there actually a guy name steve who got his car stuck in a tree, and then the guy who is not steve mentioned the story of steve to mock steve?

     no

      but then why did mail to steve go to the guy who is not steve?

     could be his stage name

      is it because climbing the mountain sounds like something steve would do, and he's known by the townsfolk for doing that?

     yes, that is a fantastic explanation

4.17.20  6:25 pm   What's your opinion on having an opinion

      some of them sound the same but are different, and some of them are the same but sound different

4.17.20  6:00 pm   What is your favorite word?

      polk

4.17.20  5:57 pm   what video did you have the most fun making?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

4.17.20  5:52 pm   will you ever go on tour with your music

      yes

4.17.20  5:48 pm   what's the difference between a duck

      one leg's the same

4.17.20  5:33 pm   What is a superstition you have?

      touch the door and come back, before doing a play-through when songwriting

4.17.20  5:27 pm   are you ever disappointed by what you create? 

      in some ways but not others

4.17.20  5:11 pm   what if words are just a collection of sounds and symbols with no inherent meaning other than what we attach to them?

      then i think we would all have been very tired out by now, from attaching all that meaning

4.17.20  4:57 pm   Are you gonna make a 20 minute thing like the history of the world I guess on the Vietnam war

      no

4.17.20  4:28 pm   could you answer my question in blue?

     absolutely not

4.17.20  4:17 pm   have you ever typed a capital letter

      let me see

4.17.20  4:09 pm   wHaT sHoUlD i NaMe My LiZaRd

      let it name you first

4.17.20  3:50 pm   are you still in the airport terminal?

      no

4.17.20  3:32 pm   for about two months now i've been having recurring dreams about cracking my phone screen. what does this mean for my psyche and/or future

      according to my calculations it means your phone is very important to you, and you do not think you could get a screen replacement easily if you needed one

4.17.20  3:31 pm   are knock knock jokes funny?

      knock knock, yes they are
